recipes.label: Find Clients looking to Travel
recipes.startdescription: I work the crowd sifting for clients who appreciate the discression and adventure that the Kite can offer, and who have the funds to pay the fare.

recipes.label: No Interest
recipes.description: No person in the bars tonight carry the right blend of bravado and careful planning to buy a passage on my ship. I will have to put myself out there again, on another night.

recipes.label: A Passenger!
recipes.description: A careful conversation, a declaration of a destination and then an exchange of funds. I have found a passenger who wishes to travel.
